#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long int x;
    double y,c;
    cin>>x>>y;
    c=x+ 0.5;
    if(x%5 !=0 || (c+0.5)>y)
    cout<<fixed<<setprecision(2)<<showpoint <<y<<endl;
    else
    {
        y=y-c;
        
        cout<<fixed<<setprecision(2)<<showpoint <<y<<endl;
//        printf("%.2f\n", y);
    }
//    fflush(stdin);
//    system("PAUSE");
    return 0;
}
